text: Piṉṉar taṉ cakōtara(ṉ puṉyāmī)ṉiṉ potiyi(ṉaic cōtippata)ṟku muṉṉatāka maṟṟavarkaḷiṉ potikaḷaic cōtikka ārampittār. (Avaṟṟil atu kiṭaikkāmal pōkavē) piṉṉar taṉ cakōtaraṉiṉ mūṭṭaiyiliruntu atai veḷippaṭuttiṉār. (Taṉ cakōtaraṉai eṭuttuk koḷḷa) yūsuḥpukku inta upāyattai nām kaṟpittōm. Allāh nāṭiṉālē tavira avar taṉ cakōtaraṉai eṭuttukkoḷḷa (ekiptu) aracariṉ caṭṭappaṭi muṭiyātiruntatu. Nām virumpiyavarkaḷiṉ patavikaḷai uyarttukiṟōm. Ovvoru kalvimāṉukkum mēlāṉa oru kalvimāṉ irukkiṟāṉ. (Āṉāl, nāmō aṉaivaraiyumviṭa mēlāṉa kalvimāṉ)
